title: I.Sicily inscription 001672
support: A fragment of black and white mosaic, broken on all sides

layout.p: Three letters are preserved in black tesserae against a white background, with white space to left and above, but the text broken off to the right

handNote.lettering: Plain regular letters. Alpha has broken bar.

provenanceFound._: Seemingly part of a group of material found near the north-west corner of the peristyle of the 'Casa delle ghirlande', probably during the excavations of V. Tusa in the 1950s

provenanceObserved._: On display in the site antiquarium

repository._: Area Archeologica e Antiquarium di Solunto

museum.name: Area Archeologica e Antiquarium di Solunto
museum.description: There are two museum buildings at the site. The first, at the entrance, gives an overview of the site and its excavations, then treats some of the individual buildings and areas within the site. The inscriptions are here (from the theatre). The second, at the exit, contains the small finds, and begins with the archaic (indigenous and punic layers), then moves to the Hellenistic and Roman periods. There are numerous ceramics, some sculpture, some wall paintings and mosaics

location.address: Via Collegio Romano, 90017 - Solunto Santa Flavia (PA)

bibl.author: Portale, Milazzo, Montali
bibl.title: Nuovi dati sulle decorazioni parietali di Solunto
bibl.citation: Elisa Chiara Portale, Giuseppe Milazzo, and Gilberto Montali, “Nuovi Dati Sulle Decorazioni Parietali Di Solunto,” in Animum Pictura Pascit (Verg., Aen. 1, 464). Abitare Con Le Pitture Nel Mediterraneo Antico. Atti Delle Giornate Gregoriane XIII Edizione (Agrigento 29 November - 1 Dicembre 2019), ed. Valentina Caminneci, Maria Concetta Parello, and Maria Serena Rizzo (Bologna: Ante Quem, 2020), 157–72

bibl.author: Portale
bibl.title: Problemi dell'archeologia della Sicilia ellenistico-romana: il caso di Solunto
bibl.citation: E.C. Portale, “Problemi Dell’archeologia Della Sicilia Ellenistico-Romana: Il Caso Di Solunto,” Archeologia Classica 57 (2006): 49–114

publicationTitles: Nuovi dati sulle decorazioni parietali di Solunto
keywords: area archeologica e antiquarium di solunto
